innerHTML.welcome-to-vdo-ninja-chat: Welcome to VDO.Ninja! You can send text messages directly to connected peers from here.
innerHTML.click-here-for-help: Click Here for a quick overview and help
innerHTML.welcome-to-control-room:
Welcome. This is the director's control-room for the group-chat.

You can host a group chat with friends using a room. Share the blue link to invite guests who will join the chat automatically.

Known Limitations with Group Rooms:
  • A group room can handle up to around 30 guests, depending on numerous factors, including CPU and available bandwidth of all guests in the room. To achieve more than around 7-guests though, you will likely want to disable video sharing between guests. Using &broadcast, &roombitrate=0 or &novideo are options there.
  • Videos will appear of low quality on purpose for guests and director; this is to save bandwidth and CPU resources. It will be high-quality within OBS still though.
  • The state of the scenes, such as which videos are active in a scene, are lost when the director resets the control-room or the scene.

    • Further Notes:

  • Links to Solo-views of each guest video are offered under videos as they load. These can be used within an OBS Browser Source.
  • You can use the auto-mixing Group Scenes, the green links, to auto arrange multiple videos for you in OBS.
  • You can use this control room to record isolated video or audio streams, but it is an experimental feature still.
  • If you transfer a guest from one room to another, they won't know which room they have been transferred to.
  • OBS will see a guest's video in high-quality; the default video bitrate is 2500kbps. Setting higher bitrates will improve motion.
  • VP8 is typically the default video codec, but using &codec=vp9 or &codec=h264 as a URL in OBS can help to reduce corrupted video puke issues.
  • &stereo=2 can be added to guests to turn off audio effects, such as echo cancellation and noise-reduction.
  • https://invite.cam is a free service provided that can help obfuscuate the URL parameters of an invite link given to guests.
  • Adding &showonly=SOME_OBS_VIRTUALCAM to the guest invite links allows for only a single video to be seen by the guests; this can be output of the OBS Virtual Camera for example

    • For advanced URL options and parameters, see the Wiki.

innerHTML.info-blob:
Що таке LiveSync


  • LiveSync - це гібридне рішення AV і комунікації в реальному часі для кіберспорту, яке дозволяє організаторам турнірів (TO) захоплювати аудіо- і відеопотоки талантів та передавати їх з високою якістю в реальному часі. Використовуючи протокол WebRTC, ми забезпечуємо затримку менше секунди (~500 мс) між талантами та реальною грою. Крім того, наша система може використовувати інші протоколи реального часу (наприклад, RTMP, SRT, HLS тощо) в певних сценаріях.

  • Наше рішення пропонує гнучкість розподілу будь-якого сигналу через адаптивний медіа-сервер, розроблений внутрішньою компанією, надаючи повний контроль над ситуацією з талантами, включаючи доступ до їх обладнання та статус підключення.

  • Крім того, ми надаємо спеціалізовані інструменти комунікації для взаємодії з талантами під час трансляцій. Це включає можливість безпосереднього спілкування з будь-яким талантом через приватні аудіоканали, які не транслюються аудиторії. Ці захищені канали дозволяють нам вести розмови поза ефіром з талантами та полегшувати приватні обговорення між ними для координації або інших цілей, забезпечуючи конфіденційність цих комунікацій та їх відділення від прямої трансляції.
innerHTML.more-than-four-can-join: Це місця для гостей як приклад, їх може бути більше
innerHTML.privacy-disabled: Privacy warning: The director will be able to remotely access your camera and microphone if you continue.
innerHTML.allow-effects-invite: Allow video effects to be used
innerHTML.please-select-option-to-join: Please select an option to join.
innerHTML.looking-to-just-chat-and-not-direct: Looking to just chat and not direct?
innerHTML.for-the-best-possible-experience-make-su: For the best possible experience, make sure

innerHTML.1080p-screen-capture-guide: For achieving 1080p60 game-capture, see here
innerHTML.generate-host-link: Create a link for the host speaker
innerHTML.guests-only-see-director: Гості можуть бачити тільки відео режисера
innerHTML.update-your-device:
We've detected that you are using an old version of Apple iOS, which is known to have many issues.

Please consider updating.
innerHTML.enter-the-whep-URL-you-wish-to-share: Enter the WHEP URL you wish to share.
innerHTML.click-for-quick-room-overview: Click Here for a quick overview and help
innerHTML.names-and-labels-coming-soon: Names identifying connected peers will be a feature in an upcoming release.

miscellaneous.new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.submit-error-report: Press OK to submit any error logs to VDO.Ninja. Error logs may contain private information.
miscellaneous.director-redirect-1: The director wishes to redirect you to the URL:
miscellaneous.audio-processing-disabled: Audio processing is disabled with this guest. Can't mute or change volume
miscellaneous.not-the-director: <font color='red'>You are not the director of this room.  You will have limited to no control.  You can try claiming the room after the first director leaves.</font>
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Only the first person to join a room is the assigned director.

Refresh after the first director leaves to claim.
miscellaneous.token-room-is-claimed:
The room is claimed by someone else.

Join as a guest or co-director instead.
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed-codirector:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Trying to join as a co-director...
miscellaneous.streamid-already-published:
The stream ID you are publishing to is already in use.

Please try with a different invite link or refresh to retry again.

You will now be disconnected.
miscellaneous.room-test-not-good:
The room name 'test' is very commonly used and may not be secure.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?
miscellaneous.load-previous-session: Would you like to load your previous session's settings?
miscellaneous.enter-password:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.enter-password-2:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive.)
miscellaneous.enter-director-password:
Please enter the director's password:

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.password-incorrect:
The password was incorrect.

Refresh and try again.
miscellaneous.enter-new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.what-bitrate: What bitrate would you like to record at? (kbps)
miscellaneous.enter-website: Enter a website URL to share
miscellaneous.press-ok-to-record:
Press OK to start recording. Press again to stop and download.

Warning: Keep this browser tab active to continue recording.

You can change the default video bitrate if desired below (kbps)
miscellaneous.no-streamID-provided:
No streamID was provided; one will be generated randomily.

Stream ID:
miscellaneous.alphanumeric-only:
Info: Only AlphaNumeric characters should be used for the stream ID.

The offending characters have been replaced by an underscore
miscellaneous.stream-id-too-long:
The Stream ID should be less than 45 alPhaNuMeric characters long.

We will trim it to length.
miscellaneous.share-with-trusted: Share only with those you trust
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-room:
Transfer guests to room:

(Please note rooms must share the same password)
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-url:
Transfer guests to new website URL.

(Guests will be prompted to accept)
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-users: Are you sure you wish to disconnect these users?
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-user: Are you sure you wish to disconnect this user?
miscellaneous.enter-new-codirector-password: Enter a co-director password to use
miscellaneous.volume-control: Volume control for local playback only
miscellaneous.signal-meter: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
miscellaneous.waiting-for-the-stream: Waiting for the stream. Tip: Adding &cleanoutput to the URL will hide this spinner, or click to retry, which will also hide it.
miscellaneous.you-have-been-transferred: You've been transferred to a different room
miscellaneous.you-have-been-activated: The director has allowed you to see others in the room now
miscellaneous.you-are-no-longer-a-co-director: You are no longer a co-director as you were transferred.
miscellaneous.headphones-tip: Tip: Use headphones to avoid audio echo issues.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-c922: Tip: To achieve 60-fps with a C922 webcam, low-light compensation needs to be turned off, exposure set to auto, and 720p used.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-camlink: Tip: A Cam Link may glitch green/purple if accessed elsewhere while already in use.
miscellaneous.samsung-a-series: Samsung A-series phones may have issues with Chrome; if so, try Firefox Mobile instead or switch video codecs.
miscellaneous.screen-permissions-denied:
Permission to capture denied. Ensure your browser has screen record system permissions

1.On your Mac, choose Apple menu  > System Preferences, click Security & Privacy , then click Privacy.
2.Select Screen Recording.
3.Select the checkbox next to your browser to allow it to record your screen.
miscellaneous.change-audio-output-device:
Audio could not be captured. Please make sure you have an audio output device available.

Some gaming headsets (ie: Corsair) may need to be set to 2-channel output to work, as surround sound drivers may cause problems.
miscellaneous.prompt-access-request: is trying to view your stream. Allow them?
miscellaneous.confirm-reload-user: Are you sure you wish to reload this user's browser?
miscellaneous.webrtc-is-blocked:
⚠ This browser has either blocked WebRTC or does not support it.

This site will not work without it.

Disable any browser extensions or privacy settings that may be blocking WebRTC, or try a different browser.
miscellaneous.not-clean-session:
Video effects or canvas rendering failed.

Check to ensure any remotely hosted images are cross-origin allowed.
miscellaneous.ios-no-screen-share: Sorry, but your iOS browser does not support screen-sharing. Please see this guide for an alternative method to do so.
miscellaneous.android-no-screen-share: Sorry, your mobile browser does not support screen-sharing. The Android native app does offer basic support for it though.
miscellaneous.no-screen-share-supported:
Sorry, your browser does not support screen-sharing.

Please use the desktop versions of Firefox or Chrome instead.
miscellaneous.speech-not-suppoted: ⚠ Speech Recognition is not supported by this browser
miscellaneous.blue-yeti-tip: Tip: Blue Yeti microphones may experience issues being overly loud. Please see here for a solution or disable auto-gain in VDO.Ninja.
miscellaneous.site-not-responsive:
Notice: The system cannot be accessed or is currently slow to respond.

If a routing issue, try adding &proxy to the URL; you can also try https://proxy.vdo.ninja or a VPN if the service is blocked in your country. If the main service is down, a backup version is also available here: https://backup.vdo.ninja Contact steve@seguin.email for added help. This service requires the use of Websockets over port 443.
miscellaneous.no-audio-source-detected:
No Audio Source was detected.

If you were wanting to capture an Application's Audio, please see:
https://docs.vdo.ninja/help/guides-and-how-tos#audio for some guides.
miscellaneous.viewer-count: Total outbound p2p connections of this remote stream
miscellaneous.enter-url-for-widget: Enter a URL for a page to embed as a sidebar
miscellaneous.vision-disabled: The Director has disabled your vision temporarily
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code:
Invalid remote control code.

Use the field below to try again with a different passcode.
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code-obs:
Invalid remote control code.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help..
miscellaneous.request-rejected-obs:
The request was rejected.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help.
miscellaneous.remote-token-rejected: The remote request failed; the &remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.remote-peer-connected:
Remote peer connected to video stream.

Connection to handshake server being killed on request. This increases security, but the peer will not be able to reconnect automatically on connection failure.

Press OK to start the stream!
miscellaneous.director-denied: The main director denied you as a co-director
miscellaneous.only-main-director: Only the main director can transfer this guest
miscellaneous.request-failed: The request failed; you can't apply this action
miscellaneous.tokens-did-not-match: The remote request failed; the remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.token-not-director: The request failed; the remote user did not recognize you as the director
miscellaneous.approved-as-director: The director approved you as a co-director
miscellaneous.you-are-a-codirector: You are a co-director of this room; you have partial director control assigned to you.
miscellaneous.this-is-you:
This is you, a co-director.
You are also a performer.
miscellaneous.preview-meshcast-disabled: You can't adjust the preview bitrate for Meshcast-based streams
